text: Nur al-Idah is a book written by Imam Shurunbulali (rh), and is considered one of the most famous and important Hanafi legal texts due to its comprehensive summary on matters related to worship. The book became well-known during the lifetime of the author, who later wrote an explaination called Maraqi al- Falah.
